mapper.select: SELECT la.lecture_archive_no, la.lecture_no, la.account_id, la.lecture_archive_writer, la.lecture_archive_title, la.lecture_archive_createdate, la.lecture_archive_updatedate, la.lecture_archive_count, l.teacher_name, l.lecture_name, s.subject_no, s.subject_name FROM lecture_archive la left join lecture l on la.lecture_no = l.lecture_no left join subject s on l.subject_no = s.subject_no WHERE la.account_id = #{accountId} LIMIT #{beginRow},#{rowPerPage}
SELECT count(*) count FROM lecture_archive la left join lecture l on la.lecture_no = l.lecture_no left join subject s on l.subject_no = s.subject_no WHERE la.account_id = #{accountId}
mapper.insert:

mapper.select: SELECT lecture_no lectureNo, lecture_name lectureName FROM lecture WHERE account_id = #{accountId}

SELECT la.lecture_archive_no, la.lecture_no, la.account_id, la.lecture_archive_writer, la.lecture_archive_title, la.lecture_archive_content, la.lecture_archive_updatedate, la.lecture_archive_count, laf.lecture_archive_file_original, laf.lecture_archive_file_uuid, laf.lecture_archive_file_count FROM lecture_archive la left join lecture_archive_file laf on la.lecture_archive_no = laf.lecture_archive_no WHERE la.lecture_archive_no = #{lectureArchiveNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE lecture_archive SET lecture_no = #{lectureNo}, lecture_archive_writer = #{lectureArchiveWriter}, lecture_archive_title = #{lectureArchiveTitle}, lecture_archive_content = #{lectureArchiveContent}, lecture_archive_updatedate = NOW() WHERE lecture_archive_no = #{lectureArchiveNo}
